alert.note: Alert for Fairfax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:19AM EST until January 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...In Maryland, Prince Georges County. In Virginia, Fairfax County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Wednesday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 3 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is possible along the Prince Georges and Fairfax counties coastlines during tonight`s high tide cycle.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
